profile.title: Profile ning Gumagamit
profile.mustLogin: Kailangan mung mag-log in para akit deng settings.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Ipakit deng original at isinalin a mensahi
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Ipakit deng original at salin kapamilatan
profile.saveError: May mali: E me maisalba deng settings
profile.avatarError: Malyari ne e me-upload ing avatar
profile.noPrivateKey: Ala yang private key king device a ini para i-export.
profile.setBackupPassword: Magsalâ password para encrypt deng backup mu:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Ilagay ing password para king backup a ini:
profile.importSuccess: Me-import ne ing private key king device a ini.
profile.importFailed: E me-import ing key (maling password o corrupt a file).
profile.keysRotated: Me-gawa yang bayung pares a key at me-upload ne ing public key.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Ing private key mu ali yang lalabas king device a ini. I-export ya ing password-protected copy para ibalik king aliwang device.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Libre ka pa — gamitan deng madali a opsyon a Aldo/Bulan king baba. Mag-upgrade para buksan deng karagdagang tema.
profile.backupDesc: Gumawa kang password-protected backups ding keys mu, at ibalik la king aliwang device para magsync.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: I-blur nung e naka-focus ing app
profile.notifyOnCopy: Sabian nakung me-kopya deng mensahi ku
profile.followHint: Mekikit la deng istorya da king Following feed mu nung mag-post la king Followers o Public.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Atin yang meging mali king seksyung ini.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: I-forward deng daratang a tawag at text king verified mong telepono o email. Deng lalabas a tawag/text makapakit yang Chatforia number mu.

chat.selectPrompt: Pili kang mensahi o chat room para umpisan ing pamikpami
